name: Fallen Empire Calamity
permanentEffect: The fallen empire exerts its influence over the galaxy, causing widespread instability.
flavourText: *The galaxy trembles under the shadow of the fallen empire.*

name: Galactic Plague
permanentEffect: A deadly plague spreads across the galaxy, decimating populations and crippling economies.
flavourText: *A silent killer sweeps through the stars, leaving despair in its wake.*
